definitions: lack of care and organization; excessive casualness

examples.text: the task is to expose intellectual sloppiness and fraud
don't let deadlines be an excuse for sloppiness

definitions: the quality of clothing being casual and loose-fitting

examples.text: Joseph joined them, apologizing for the sloppiness of his attire

shortDefinitions: quality of clothing being casual and loose-fitting

definitions: the state of containing too much liquid; wateriness

examples.text: the sloppiness of a lobster roll

shortDefinitions: state of containing too much liquid

examples.text: scenes without over-dramatization or sentimental sloppiness
